name: Tits and Shadows
description:
Introducing Tits and Shadows, a captivating turn-based RPG that seamlessly blends thrilling battles, puzzles, and tantalizing adult content. Immerse yourself in a world teeming with diverse enemies, intriguing NPCs, and engaging quests.
Prepare for epic encounters as you engage in strategic turn-based battles against formidable foes. Develop your party of skilled warriors, each with their unique abilities and strengths, and unravel the mysteries that lie within the game.

But the adventure doesn't stop there. Tits and Shadows goes beyond traditional RPGs, offering a captivating blend of sensuality and storytelling. Delve into a realm where passions run deep, and forge intimate connections with a range of intriguing characters.

Introducing Divine Force!
A special feature designed for those who want to experience the game without the hassle of the battle system. With Divine Force, players can activate God Mode, granting them immense power and invincibility.

To access this incredible ability, simply navigate to the Items menu and select Divine Force. Once activated, you'll become an unstoppable force, effortlessly progressing through the game's challenges and enjoying the immersive storyline.

Please note that Divine Force is an optional feature created to enhance your gaming experience. It allows you to focus on the captivating narrative, exploration, and character development without the need for intense battles. Whether you're a casual player or simply want to enjoy the story, Divine Force is here to make your journey enjoyable and stress-free.


Disclaimer:

This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. All characters with sex scenes in this title are 21 years of age and above!

Story:

You have died and now the angel Gabriel has resurrected you in the body of his fallen champion Hero to complete a special Task. Defeat the demon queen Putana

PARTY MEMBERS

  • Becky is a courageous paladin who, captivated by the epic tales of glory her grandfather used to tell her, yearns to embark on thrilling adventures and become a true heroine.
  • Wendy, an enigmatic figure shrouded in darkness, carries the dreadful curse of the Wendigo. Her magical aura is awe-inspiring, defying known limits.
  • Cherry, the Slime Queen, longs to explore a world brimming with unparalleled adventures and emotions. With unwavering determination, she seeks to prove that her crown is not just an ornament, but a symbol of her worth and power.
  • Lisa, the Merciless, is a master of cunning and survival. Driven by an insatiable thirst for wealth and a desire for revenge, there are no limits to what she is willing to do to achieve her goals.
  • Gabriel, your faithful celestial guide, will be your salvation in the battle against the reign of Putana. With their protective presence and divine wisdom, Gabriel becomes your greatest ally in this epic struggle.
